assign2.ngram

Class NGramException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • assign2.ngram.NGramException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NGramException
extends java.lang.Exception
    This class represents any exceptions generated while dealing with NGrams. If you find that the parameters provided to your methods are invalid then you should throw a new instance of this class as specified in the requirements.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    hogan
